metadata.title: Z - Global Workspace Platform
metadata.description: Build, collaborate, and scale your content globally with Z - the workspace platform with built-in translation and localization.

hero.subtitle: The workspace platform with translation and localization built in. Create, collaborate, and scale your content globally.
hero.no_credit_card: No credit card required • Free forever for individuals

features.heading: Everything you need to go global
features.subheading: Built-in features that help you create, translate, and manage content across languages and markets.

lingo_ready.title: Lingo.dev Ready
lingo_ready.description: Seamlessly integrate with Lingo.dev for powerful translation workflows and glossary management.

multi_language.title: Multi-language Support
multi_language.description: Create content in one language and distribute it globally with built-in translation tools.

real_time.title: Real-time Collaboration
real_time.description: Work together with your team in real-time, with changes synced instantly across all users.

rich_editor.title: Rich Text Editor
rich_editor.description: Powerful block-based editor with support for text, images, code, and custom content blocks.

team_workspaces.title: Team Workspaces
team_workspaces.description: Organize your content in workspaces, collaborate with team members, and manage permissions.

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.description: Enterprise-grade security with row-level access control and encrypted data storage.

how_it_works.heading: Simple, powerful workflow
how_it_works.subheading: From content creation to global distribution in three easy steps

step1.title: Create your workspace
step1.description: Set up your workspace and invite your team. Organize your content with flexible document structures.

step2.title: Build your content
step2.description: Use our rich editor to create documents with text, images, code blocks, and more. Structure ready for translation.

step3.title: Go global with Lingo.dev
step3.description: Add Lingo.dev integration to enable translation workflows, glossary management, and multi-language distribution.

cta.heading: Ready to build for a global audience?
cta.subheading: Join teams using Z to create and distribute content worldwide.
